title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 246.8 - Application for extension of storage period
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 246.8 - Application for extension of storage period

State Regulations

An application for an extension of the storage period
beyond 24 months must be submitted at least 20 days before the expiration of
such 24-month period. The application shall state: (a) the lot numbers; (b) the date when the food was first placed
in cold storage; (c) the condition
of the food at the time of application; (d) the length of time for which an extension
is asked; and
(e) the reasons for
requesting extension. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
246.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
